name: 1 Bit Maze
description:
Basically solving a maze blind!

  • Move with Arrow Keys.
  • Left click to select menu options.

If you press an arrow key and the screen flashes black, that means there is a wall in that direction. if you press an arrow key and the screen stays white, that means you moved in that direction.

How fast can you beat all 12 levels?

Send me your best time and feedback on twitter to, @JoshEmpire47

Good luck!
